    • Method Detail

      • reinit

        public void reinit()
        Empty skeleton method intended to be overridden. reinit() should reinitialize the sketch completely, making no assumptions about pre-existing conditions.

      • rewind

        public void rewind()
        Intended for use with rendering animations and the like where it might be necessary to tell a sketch to reset its current state to the start of a sequence. Where reinit() implies that the sketch should generate a new set of parameters reinit() should merely prepare the sketch for a new render.

      • draw

        public void draw()
        Empty skeleton method to be overridden with custom code.

      • pre

        public void pre()

      • post

        public void post()

      • map

        public static final float map(float value,
        float istart,
        float istop,
        float ostart,
        float ostop)
        Map function taken from PApplet.java, maps input from one min..max range to another.
        Parameters:
        value - Current value
        istart - Minimum value of input
        istop - Maximum value bound of input
        ostart - Minimum value of output
        ostop - Maximum value bound of output
        Returns:
